name: Ruined Jungle
description:
Ruined Jungle was the project given to me by my friends as my first true attempt in game development. 

Being a beginner who started started making game last month in unreal engine it was a lot of fun.

.

You have to get to the top of the ruined temple to end the game travelling through a mysterious jungle ... but look out you are not alone .

.

Help/Controls

WASD - To move

Mouse UP/DOWN - To change Weapon (there are 2)

Left Mouse - To Shoot

R - Reload

Shift - To Sprint

Space - To  Jump

Esc - To Pause Game

Game has two orbs things : Green orb for health and Orange orb for Ammo ... walk on to collect them

.

Issues:

Try shooting on upper part of the Enemy Monster … as there are some issues with the collision … 

Gun Animation Sometime does not work correctly

I may not update this project as I want to make other stuff this is just an short experimental game.
